summary: Alyndra is an adaptation from Randi. She is more powerful with magic and fighting.Give her a try and see what you think.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#b6d7a8][size=6]
Alyndra

[size=5]Breton Female[/size][/size]
[font=Verdana][color=#d9ead3][size=4]Bodies-Zoe's Body,CBBE-HDT,UUNP-HDT
Voice-Female Sultry
Perks and Spells- Too many to list
Levels with Player-2 to 150
Class-Combat Night Blade
Essential and Marriageable
Location-Four Shields Tavern in Dragon Bridge[/size][/color][/font][font=Verdana]
[/font][/color][font=Verdana]
[/font][/center][color=#b6d7a8]
[/color]
[center][font=Verdana][color=#b4a7d6][size=3]Alyndra Is a Night Blade with many perks and spells at her command.She is a very powerful ally to have by your side(at least I think so). Her features are derived from one of my other followers, Randi. I haven't fully tested her in real combat but I imagine she will hold her own. I know she is not as attractive as some of my other followers but I am not disappointed with how I made her look. I guess beauty is in the eye of the beholder. She is wearing Penitus Oculatus armor and has two enchanted Ebony daggers and an enchanted Ebony bow with Ebony arrows. I think she has weapons that she can deal some damage with.Hope she is worth the download.


[color=#a4c2f4][size=4]UPDATE[/size][/color][color=#9fc5e8][size=4]:[/size][/color]
Added new body and face files
[/size][/color][/font][font=Verdana][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4253/35035839283_0836178456_h.jpg[/img]
[color=#d9d2e9][size=3]UUNP HDT[/size][/color]
&

[/font][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4257/35005285184_14ec9ab07f_h.jpg[/img][/center]

All constructive comments and screenshots will be appreciated[/size].
